question: On Tuesday, Jessica wants to exercise for thrice the amount of time he did on Monday and Sunday combined. On Sunday he exercised for 34 minutes. On Monday he exercised for 45 minutes. How many minutes does he have to exercise on Tuesday to reach his goal?
answer:
On Sunday and Monday he exercised a total of 79 minutes because 34 + 45 = <<34+45=79>>79
On Tuesday he has to exercise for 237 minutes because 79*3 = <<79*3=237>>237
#### 237
